Attributes.description: Innate and adaptive immune responses to bacterial and viral pathogens, autoimmunity, allergies and graft rejection; virus structure, replication cycles, pathogenesis and vaccines; data analysis of foundational immunology and virology experiments.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of BIOL 112, BIOL 200, BMEG 245, SCIE 001.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Thu, Start Time: 10:00, End Time: 11:00, Building: Buchanan, Room: D314
